name: narration-restore-verify
description: After loading a save made at ramen1, verify narration resumes there instead of restarting from intro. Requires narration-save to have run first with the same JOYCE_RWPATH.

steps.comment: Narration should start (either from restore or from intro)
MUST resume at ramen1. If this times out, the bug is present: narration restarted at intro instead of restoring saved position.
